title: Google\Cloud\GkeMultiCloud\V1\AzureAuthorization
name: AzureAuthorization
description:
Configuration related to the cluster RBAC settings.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkemulticloud.v1.AzureAuthorization

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.admin_users
params.description: Required. Users that can perform operations as a cluster admin. A managed ClusterRoleBinding will be created to grant the cluster-admin ClusterRole to the users. Up to ten admin users can be provided. For more info on RBAC, see https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/rbac/#user-facing-roles

methods.name: getAdminUsers
methods.description:
Required. Users that can perform operations as a cluster admin. A managed ClusterRoleBinding will be created to grant the cluster-admin ClusterRole to the users. Up to ten admin users can be provided.
